examples.example: 我刚刚读完了一部非常精彩的小说，让我受益匪浅。

translate.english: I just finished reading a very wonderful novel, which benefited me a lot.

examples.example: 我刚刚看了一部十分有趣的电影，心情变得格外愉悦。

translate.english: I just watched a very interesting movie and my mood became extremely pleasant.

examples.example: 我最近观看了一部极具教育意义的纪录片，从中收获了很多知识。

translate.english: I recently watched a very educational documentary and gained a lot of knowledge from it.
